entries.do_not_edit: The English version of this file (rtp_wedge_main.stf) is automatically generated by the SwgConversationEditor.
entries.s_13: Greetings trooper. I'm working on locating some starships take by Imperial forces. I may need your help on this later, but for now I have it under control. Check with others on the base for your assignments.
entries.s_20: I'm receiving word that we managed to recover almost 85% of the starships and even some starship parts. Good work. I'm off duty in a few, but Princess Leia was looking for an operative of your skills. Report to her.
entries.s_32: Listen in on a meeting of Imperial officers. With luck, they'll let slip the location of some starships the Empire has taken from us. We need to get those back.
entries.s_34: Good, you're here. Call me Wedge. Your orders are to go to Bela Vistal and listen in on a meeting of Imperial officers. With luck, they'll let slip the location of some starships the Empire has taken from us. We need to get those back.
entries.s_43: This is active duty stuff, trooper. Come back when you're serious.
entries.s_44: Stand back. This is no place for your kind. Move it.
